attributes.action: shutdown the "Church of Scientology Mission of York" with immediate effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite being what most people think as a harmless fad, this "religion"- founded by a science fiction writer- is extremely dangerous and has resulted in the ruination of multiple people's lives, most infamously, that of Lisa McPherson. Its expansion must be stopped.
